name: Broken Heart Tee by Nay Arts and HAS by Shannon
description:
This is a collaboration between HAS and Nay Arts of Las Vegas.  The orignal artwork was created by Nay Arts of Las Vegas and HAS by Shannon created the shirt by using heat transfer and Swarovski Crystals for the broken heart effect.  This shirt is called "Broken Heart"

***Shannon's shirts are all handmade by the artist herself and are considered to be functional art pieces. She only uses authentic Swarovski crystals on the pieces. Garment should be washed inside out on cold and lined dry. Please note that heat will activate the rhinestones and they may come off if heat is used***

name: Madonna- Don't Stop
description:
This shirt is handmade by Shannon and is super cute with a pair of jeans and some big hoop earrings on those days you want to look cute with little effort. Hearts are embellished with Swarovski Crystal Flatbacks.

THIS IS AN ORIGINAL HAS DESIGN BY SHIRTGIRL aka SHANNON RUTHER WHO CREATED THE LIT CIGARETTE EFFECT IN 2007.  THIS SHIRT IS SOLD IN HIGH END BOUTIQUES AND ART GALLERIES IN LAS VEGAS AND BOULDER CITY, NV
THIS UNIQUE SHIRT IS HANDMADE BY THE ARTIST HERSELF. SHANNON'S SHIRTS ARE CONSIDERED TO BE FUNCTIONAL ART PIECES AND RETAIL PRICE IS $69. GET ONE ON SALE WHILE YOU STILL CAN AS THIS IS A LIMITED EDITION PIECE AND WILL ONLY BE AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME.
****Handwash inside out cold. Line dry or lay flat.  Please note that heat will activate the rhinestones and they could come off the shirt if heat is applied**

name: Madonna- Smokin
description:
This is an original HAS by Shannon design where shannon creates the lit cigarette effect she designed in 2007.  This shirt was previously only sold in art galleries and select high end boutiques.  This design will only be sold for a limited time and only a select quantity will be produced to preserve the art and the design techniques used in this piece. Retail price is $69.

***Shannon's shirts are all handmade by the artist herself and are considered to be functional art pieces. She only uses authentic Swarovski crystals on the pieces.  Garment should be washed inside out on cold and lined dry.  Please note that heat will activate the rhinestones and they may come off if heat is used***

name: Madonna- Danger Zone Tee or Tank
description:
This shirt is super dangerous. Use caution when wearing this one, people are sure to take notice.  It is handmade with Swarovski flatback Crystal Rhinestones.  And the skull on her glove is done using Rhinestuds. This shirt is super cool. 

THIS IS AN ORIGINAL HAS DESIGN BY SHIRTGIRL aka SHANNON RUTHER WHO CREATED THE LIT CIGARETTE EFFECT IN 2007.  THIS SHIRT IS SOLD IN HIGH END BOUTIQUES AND ART GALLERIES IN LAS VEGAS AND BOULDER CITY, NV
THIS UNIQUE SHIRT IS HANDMADE BY THE ARTIST HERSELF. SHANNON'S SHIRTS ARE CONSIDERED TO BE FUNCTIONAL ART PIECES AND RETAIL PRICE IS $69. GET ONE ON SALE WHILE YOU STILL CAN AS THIS IS A LIMITED EDITION PIECE AND WILL ONLY BE AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME.

***Shannon's shirts are all handmade by the artist herself and are considered to be functional art pieces. She only uses authentic Swarovski crystals on the pieces.  Garment should be washed inside out on cold and lined dry.  Please note that heat will activate the rhinestones and they may come off if heat is used***

Shirts should be washed inside out on cold and air dried.  Do not use heat on Rhinestones as they are activated by heat and will come off.
